summary: BlackRock is a huge American company that manages investments. It was started in 1988 and now oversees a massive $10 trillion in assets. Headquartered in New York City, it operates worldwide with offices in 30 countries. BlackRock is known for managing iShares, a popular type of investment fund. It's one of the top three companies in managing index funds. BlackRock also offers software and services to help other financial firms manage risks. Despite some criticism about its investment choices and ties to the Federal Reserve, BlackRock is a major player in the global financial industry.
title: BlackRock
